title: Can't recover PBE account.
body:
I've tried many times to recover my PBE account as the client instructs, but all I get is ether a generic response, or something that doesn't even help or address what I asked. Is there any way to directly contact someone who I know won't respond to me with a generic copy paste response?

http://puu.sh/tmeMJ/5aa4e8ea37.jpg

replies.body:
I took a look at your ticket and it seems you received a fresh reply today. If you have any further issues recovering your account, let our specialist know in your ticket so we can assist you further!

Let me know if you have any other questions.

They told me that they reset my password, but I already had my password. My issue is that my PBE account is disabled, not that I don't have the password. I would really appreciate it if it could possibly be reactivated, and if not I would even be happy to have to make a new one. Is that possible? Thanks for reading and have a nice day.
Go ahead and bump your support ticket with this info so we can assist you further. ^.^
